== Gameplay ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Day/night cycle]]
|There is a now a sun and moon that cycle across the sky, and light levels change based on the time.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Smelting]]

|}
